scripts.commit-check: pnpm cyp-clean && pnpm biome-format && pnpm lint
scripts.cyp-component: pnpm cyp-clean &&  hcp vault-secrets run -- cypress open --component
scripts.cyp-e2e-headless: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e
scripts.cyp-e2e-headless-auth: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e --headless --spec 'cypress/e2e/auth/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.cyp-open: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress open
scripts.cyp-test-e2e: pnpm drizzle-generate-test && pnpm drizzle-migrate-test && pnpm cyp-e2e-headless
scripts.db-create: docker exec -it dashboard-postgres psql -U {your_postgres_user} -c "CREATE DATABASE postgres_test;"
scripts.db-reset-dev: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx scripts/reset-dev.ts
scripts.db-reset-prod: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx scripts/reset-prod.ts
scripts.db-reset-test: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx scripts/reset-test.ts
scripts.drizzle-generate-dev: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=scripts/drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-generate-prod: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=scripts/drizzle-prod.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-generate-test: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=scripts/drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-migrate-dev: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=scripts/drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-migrate-prod: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=scripts/drizzle-prod.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-migrate-test: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=scripts/drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-push-dev: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit push --config=scripts/drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-push-prod: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit push --config=scripts/drizzle-prod.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-push-test: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit push --config=scripts/drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.seed-db-dev: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx scripts/seed-dev-db.ts --config=scripts/drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.seed-db-prod: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx scripts/seed-prod-db.ts --config=scripts/drizzle-prod.config.ts
scripts.seed-db-test: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx scripts/seed-test-db.ts --config=scripts/drizzle-test.config.ts
